summary: I love wings on my characters and I loved the look of these wings made by Guffeh :D Decided to make them Blood red & Have them how i truly love them<3
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b][color=#ff0000]simply a red version of the beautiful alduin wings :) Enjoy running around with blood red wings on your back! [/color]
[color=#1e84cc]Please tell me what you think <3[/color]
[/b][color=#ff0000]Craft-able Alduin's Wings[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Available under the Dragon section at the forge.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]=============================================[/color]

[color=#ff0000]=============================================[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Needed Materials: 2 Dragon Bone, 3 Dragon Scale, 4 Leather, 4 Leather Strips.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Upgrade Materials: 1 Dragon Bone, 1 Dragon Scale[/color]
[color=#ff0000]=============================================[/color]
[url=http://s1199.photobucket.com/user/xthelostnekox/media/Untitled_zps93zy6dtx.jpg.html][img width=843,height=344]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa473/xthelostnekox/Untitled_zps93zy6dtx.jpg[/img][/url]
[color=#ff0000]=============================================[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Comes in Heavy Armor and Light Armor Versions.[/color]
[url=http://s1199.photobucket.com/user/xthelostnekox/media/20160916111901_1_zpsnahb9rp4.jpg.html][img]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa473/xthelostnekox/20160916111901_1_zpsnahb9rp4.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://s1199.photobucket.com/user/xthelostnekox/media/20160916111554_1_zpsgwucugti.jpg.html][img]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa473/xthelostnekox/20160916111554_1_zpsgwucugti.jpg[/img][/url]
[/size]
author: Danikitty
